name: indigo-dyed playsilks
description: arrow families helped to dye these 100% silk playsilks in indigo...some are solid & some are tie-dyed, and they are a generous size, 30" square. perfect for all sorts of creative play! (or, mom could even wear it...)

name: ditty bag
Living Arrow Art print by Megan Fowler of Brown Parcel Press
description:
Introducing our Living Arrow Art Prints

"you are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth"
-Kahlil Gibran

We've commissioned some of our favorite local artists & friends to produce limited edition art prints inspired by one of our favorite quotes from Kahlil Gibran's beloved book, "The Prophet". Each print measures 11" x 14" and is included in a limited edition of 18 prints per design.

Megan Fowler's print was letterpressed in her studio and is ready for framing.

name: Living Arrow Art print by Hope Hilton
description:
Introducing our Living Arrow Art Prints

"you are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth"
-Kahlil Gibran

We've commissioned some of our favorite local artists & friends to produce limited edition art prints inspired by one of our favorite quotes from Kahlil Gibran's beloved book, "The Prophet". Each print measures 11" x 14" and is included in a limited edition of 18 prints per design.

Hope Hilton's print is screenprinted with metallic ink via our friends at Double Dutch Press and is ready for framing.

name: arrow community cookbook
description:
filled with over 80 recipes from arrow friends and family far and wide, including our friend & Top Chef Judge, Hugh Acheson, our first community cookbook makes a great gift for your friends, family, or yourself...

each copy is $24 and all proceeds benefit arrow's programs & services.
